Hello, I'm **Faisal Jan** from Turbat, Pakistan. I love to work on Data Science and AI projects that are used to solve real world porblems. You can find some of these projects on [GitHub](https://github.com/FaisaljanBaloch) or you can discuss your project with me at faisaljanfazal@yahoo.com.
